description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Set in the fictional fantasy world of Glomundia. Contains a garden pot movement game. (In garden pot movement game move the pot around using the D-Pad and press A up to 2 times to change the scene).
